DOC.brief_summary: The prevalence overweight United States Air Force ( USAF ) 22 % . The objective study compare effectiveness minimal contact behavioral therapy plus usual care group ( MCBT+UC ) use control experimental comparison usual care ( UC ) . Subjects USAF personnel 5lbs Maximum Allowable Weight ( MAW ) heavier . The primary hypothesis : MCBT+UC significant weight loss compare UC .
DOC.brief_title: Preventing Overweight USAF Personnel : Minimal Contact Program
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study compare relative effectiveness two approach weight management , use control comparison experiment . The two approach : Minimal Contact Behavior Therapy Plus Usual Care ( MCBT+UC ) include orientation meeting , provision self-help book , use interactive weight management web site 6 month , 2 brief motivational interview telephone follow-up , plus usual care ; Usual Care ( UC ) include orientation meeting usual care ( consist require USAF annual physical fitness exam , participation mandatory weight loss fitness program , requirement stay Maximum Allowable Weight [ MAW ] , penalties separation potential contingency failure remain MAW ) . The primary outcome weight loss.Additional outcome include body mass index , percent body fat , waist circumference .
DOC.criteria: Within 5 pound equal MAW MAW accord USAF Weight height table Access personal computer Internet access Plan remain local area one year Male female age 1855 year Pregnant , plan become pregnant becomes pregnant Weight loss 10 pound past 3 month No prescription nonprescription weightloss medication least 6 month prior screen On medical profile . Specific exclusion include history myocardial infarction , stroke , cancer past 5 year , diabetes , angina , orthopedic joint problem would prohibit exercise .
